landing_content: Are you tired of waiting for answers or need instant assistant? Jesica is here to save the day! As an AI Assistant, she's designed to provide fast and accurate responses to all your inquiries about Telkomsigma's solutions and services.
landing_desc_1: Silakan tuliskan pertanyaan atau masalah anda pada kotak obrolan, dan JeSICA akan dengan cepat memberikan jawaban terbaik untuk anda.
landing_desc_2: JeSICA menyediakan informasi mengenai dukungan teknis, product, atau pelayanan umum dengan jawaban yang andal untuk anda.
landing_desc_3: Temukan pengalaman berbicara yang menyenangkan dan mudah dipahami, memudahkan Anda menjelajahi layanan kami dengan lancar dan tanpa kesulitan.
chats_page__capabilities_description: Filled with an explanation of the capabilities possessed by JeSICA. Approximately 2-3 lines.
chats_page__limitations_description: Filled with an explanation of the capabilities possessed by JeSICA. Approximately 2-3 lines.
chats_page__suggestions_description: Contains questions that users might ask.
chats_page__suggestions_1: Seragam apa yang kamu kenakan pada hari Senin?
chats_page__footer: Jesica terus mengalami peningkatan, dan tanggapannya mungkin menjadi lebih akurat seiring berjalannya waktu.
login_page__login_now: Login now to access internal data!
login_page__modal_verify_description: Please enter the OTP code below to verify your email address to make sure that you are the rightful user
verification_page__decription: Please enter the OTP code send to
verification_page__modal_description: You can start interacting with Jessica to discuss Telkom Sigma's internal data
logout__modal_title: Are you sure want to logout?
logout__modal_description: Logging out will end your current session, and you will need to log in again to access your account.
